mapper.insert: insert into sale_return_sheet (id, sale_sheet_id, operator, remark, total_amount, `state`) values (#{id}, #{saleSheetID}, #{operator}, #{remark}, #{totalAmount}, #{state}) ;

insert into sale_return_sheet_content (sale_return_sheet_id, pid, quantity, unit_price, total_price, remark) values
(#{item.saleReturnSheetId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.unitPrice},#{item.totalPrice},#{item.remark})
mapper.select: select * from sale_return_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1 ;
